column4: "description" : "A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul
column5: like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone
column6: and feel the charm of existence in this spot
column7: which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy
column9: so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence
column10: that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. When
column11: while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me
column12: and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees
column13: and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary
column14: I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and
column15: as I lie close to the earth
column16: a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks
column17: and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies
column18: then I feel the presence of the Almighty
column19: who formed us in his own image
